name: Fidelity National Financial, Inc.
description: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. (FNF) is a leading provider of title insurance, technology, and transaction services to the real estate and mortgage industries. Established in 1847, FNF operates through various subsidiaries, including Fidelity National Title Group, which is one of the largest title insurance companies in the United States. The company offers a comprehensive range of services, including title insurance, escrow services, and technology solutions that streamline the real estate transaction process. FNF is dedicated to improving the efficiency and accuracy of property transactions while maintaining a strong commitment to customer service and innovation. With a rich history and a strong market presence, Fidelity National Financial has established itself as a trusted partner for real estate professionals, lenders, and consumers. The company continually invests in technology to enhance its offerings, making the property transaction process more seamless and accessible for all stakeholders. FNF is also known for its strong financial performance and commitment to shareholder value, regularly returning capital through dividends and share repurchases. The company's mission is to be the premier provider of title insurance and transaction services, leveraging its extensive experience and innovative solutions to meet the evolving needs of the real estate market.

seo.meta_title: Fidelity National Financial, Inc. | Title Insurance and Real Estate Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Fidelity National Financial, Inc., a leader in title insurance and real estate transaction services. Discover FNF's commitment to innovation and customer service.

faq.question: What does Fidelity National Financial do?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial provides title insurance and transaction services to the real estate and mortgage industries.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial?
faq.answer: Mike Nolan is the CEO of Fidelity National Financial, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Fidelity National Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Fidelity National Financial?
faq.answer: The main products include title insurance for residential and commercial properties, as well as escrow and closing services.

faq.question: When was Fidelity National Financial founded?
faq.answer: Fidelity National Financial was founded in 1847.
